div.head: 湯盪火燒
div.div: scorching by boiling water burns by fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: scorching by boiling water burns by fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tang huo shang 湯火傷 , harm caused by boiling water and fire. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhi zi 梔子：湯盪火燒，梔子末和雞子清，濃掃之 , “For scorching by boiling water and burns by fire , prepare a thick paste by mixing zhi zi powder with the clear parts of chicken eggs, and use this to wipe [the burns]”.
